definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Never have family or friends give quotes to the press. Handle your own business.
sentences.chinese: 不要让你的亲人或朋友给小道消息给媒体。

sentences.english: The magnolia liliflora is ingrained, load bearing marriage structure and family member's care.
sentences.chinese: 紫玉兰根深蒂固，承载着婚姻的结构和亲人的关心。

sentences.english: Half an hour later, they met the old man whom they miss all the time.
sentences.chinese: 半个小时后，他们终于见到了日夜思念的亲人。

sentences.english: The soldiers are still lamenting for their families.
sentences.chinese: 战士还在为思念亲人而叹息。

sentences.english: Better use of the "alive" comfort their loved ones, toh**e GREater courage and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 用更好的“活着”告慰亲人，要有更大的勇气和智慧。

sentences.english: The Day of the Dead is an ancient festival celebrated in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 鬼节是墨西哥人纪念逝去亲人的古老节日。

sentences.english: Some are wondering whether or not their loved ones will reappear.
sentences.chinese: 有些人在怀疑他们的亲人是否还会再次出现。

sentences.english: After much effort, he finally found the relatives he'd lost touch with for many years.
sentences.chinese: 几经周折，他终于找到了失散多年的亲人。

sentences.english: Do you make a special effort to get along amiably with his mother or other relatives?
sentences.chinese: 你是否尽力去善待他的母亲和亲人？

sentences.english: This year the fall, but I think the departure of their loved ones burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 这一年秋天，我想起亲人的离去却泪如雨下。

sentences.english: Uncle Lin Wei is the only family, uncle will stay around.
sentences.chinese: 林薇是舅舅的唯一亲人，舅舅将其留在身边。

sentences.english: And then we'll move towards altruism, towards non kin.
sentences.chinese: 然后我会讲对非亲人的利他主义。

sentences.english: First with Jonathan, and now with Michal, Saul starts to lose his own family members.
sentences.chinese: 先是约拿单然后是米甲，扫罗开始失去他亲人的信任。

sentences.english: I wish you health and happiness, wish to God bless you and your loved ones and friends.
sentences.chinese: 祝你健康幸福，愿神保佑你和你的亲人与朋友。

sentences.english: Make certain your loved one knows to use quick-relief medication the moment warning signs occur.
sentences.chinese: 确保你的亲人在有病发迹象时，知道如何使用吸入剂。

sentences.english: For my loved ones. I could not go down with those waves.
sentences.chinese: 我不能随波浮沉，为了我致爱的亲人。

definition: affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
to worry about/to be concerned about
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
